statements: SELECT * FROM social_media_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT post_text, post_date FROM social_media_data WHERE sentiment_score > 0.6;
SELECT user_id, post_date, sentiment_score FROM social_media_data WHERE post_text LIKE '%happy%';
SELECT id, post_text, sentiment_score FROM social_media_data WHERE post_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT post_text, user_id FROM social_media_data ORDER BY post_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM social_media_data WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT post_text, sentiment_score FROM social_media_data WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT AVG(sentiment_score) AS avg_sentiment, COUNT(*) AS count_posts FROM social_media_data GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, SUM(sentiment_score) AS total_sentiment FROM social_media_data WHERE user_id IN (1, 2) GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_sentiment > 5;
SELECT post_text, post_date FROM social_media_data WHERE post_text LIKE '%awesome%' AND post_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaPosts;
SELECT post_id, post_content, post_date FROM SocialMediaPosts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, sentiment_score FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT post_content FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT post_id, post_date, user_id FROM SocialMediaPosts ORDER BY user_id ASC, post_date DESC;
SELECT post_id, post_content, post_date FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY post_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT post_id, post_content, sentiment_score FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_posts FROM SocialMediaPosts GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_posts > 10
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE post_content LIKE '%exciting%' OR post_content LIKE '%amazing%'
SELECT post_id, post_content, sentiment_score FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE post_date >= '2023-01-01'
SELECT * FROM social_media_posts;
SELECT post_id, post_content FROM social_media_posts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM social_media_posts GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT sentiment_score, sentiment_category FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT trend_name, trend_start_date, trend_end_date FROM trend_identification WHERE trend_end_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM social_media_posts WHERE user_id = 'b3f5c898-1d89-4c9d-b885-701e0fd08424' ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT sentiment_score, sentiment_category FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT trend_name, trend_start_date, trend_end_date FROM trend_identification WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM trend_start_date) = 8;

SELECT post_content, post_date FROM social_media_posts JOIN sentiment_analysis ON social_media_posts.post_id = sentiment_analysis.post_id WHERE sentiment_category = 'positive' AND post_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT sentiment_score, sentiment_category FROM sentiment_analysis ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC, sentiment_category ASC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_accounts;
SELECT account_name, followers_count FROM social_media_accounts ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM posts WHERE account_id = 1;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_posts FROM posts;
SELECT account_id, COUNT(*) AS total_comments FROM comments GROUP BY account_id HAVING total_comments > 10;
SELECT account_id, account_name, followers_count, posts_count FROM social_media_accounts ORDER BY account_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM posts WHERE post_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY likes_count DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT account_name, followers_count, posts_count, (followers_count + posts_count) AS total_engagement FROM social_media_accounts WHERE followers_count > 10000

SELECT post_content, likes_count, shares_count, account_name FROM posts INNER JOIN social_media_accounts ON posts.account_id = social_media_accounts.account_id WHERE likes_count > 500 ORDER BY shares_count ASC LIMIT 3

SELECT comment_text, comment_date, account_name FROM comments INNER JOIN posts ON comments.post_id = posts.post_id INNER JOIN social_media_accounts ON posts.account_id = social_media_accounts.account_id WHERE account_name = 'ExampleAccount' ORDER BY comment_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY date_joined DESC;
SELECT post_content, date_posted FROM posts WHERE post_id = '12345';
SELECT user_id, comment_text FROM comments WHERE date_commented > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date_commented ASC;
SELECT user_id, count(like_id) AS like_count FROM likes GROUP BY user_id HAVING like_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY date_joined DESC;
SELECT post_content FROM posts WHERE date_posted > '2022-01-01' AND date_posted < '2022-12-31';
SELECT user_id, count(*) as total_posts FROM posts GROUP BY user_id HAVING count(*) > 5;
SELECT users.username, posts.post_content, comments.comment_text FROM users JOIN posts ON users.user_id = posts.user_id JOIN comments ON posts.post_id = comments.post_id;
